headline: Brokers Suggest Investing in PPL (PPL): Read This Before Placing a Bet
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), PPL (PPL) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

headline: PPL : Rhode Island Energy Foundation awards more than $265,000 to support Rhode Island community initiatives
summary: The Rhode Island Energy Foundation is pleased to announce that it is awarding $267,500 in funding to support 24 nonprofit organizations working to improve the lives and well-being of individuals...
